channel.title: SolidX - Join Today! NEW SERVER Dedicated To You
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3797737/bannerRS.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
[B][CENTER][SIZE=5]SolidX - Join Today![/SIZE][/CENTER]
Greetings to fellow Runescapers. SolidX is been created by close friends with a love for the game. The server is from a clean source and have been working on things for the past month and a half to make the experience as smooth as possible. Our Team and Owners are dedicated to bring the best possible gaming experience from this server. Its both for the community and for active Pk'ers. We know you enjoy the thrills of battle. Updates will be come thick and fast from our hard working coder to create an even more stability and fun for you guys. We will soon to be holding group community events with boss spawning Etc. All new players are welcome to come join us to help create a Server that is there for the fun of the players and the community we plan on building within our server. Thanks for reading and from the SolidX team, We hope to see you soon.
[size=18pt][u][b]Click the Link Below to Play[/b][/u][/size] [left][url=http://www.solidx.comule.com/Client.html]http://www.solidx.comule.com/Client.html[/url][/left]
[B][U]Features[/U][/B] Perfect combat Active economy Curses Donator System Perfect Pk'ing Server Warriors' guild Fight pits Fight cave Pest Control Barrows Dungeoneering Duel arena 20+ trainable skills Dicing Clan chat God wars
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3797769/pk.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3797773/pest_control.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3797788/logo.jpg[/img]
Will add more Images Later.
